item.title: Israeli Actor of Nadav Lapid’s Movie ‘Yes’ Was Detained Due to Provocative Poem
item.description: It’s been a tumultuous week for Israel’s film industry. The country’s equivalent to the Oscars, the Ophir Awards, was condemned by culture minister Miki Zohar after “The Sea&#8
